name: Bot Brawl (Luu Argonaut)
description:
You are living on this far-away planet, in a beautiful house and everything is great. However, your only problem is this awful, annoying neighbor of yours. The time has come, use the explosives that are tossed by the traveling frog and destroy your neighbor house before they destroy yours!

Install Instructions:

1. Right Click on the downloaded file.

2. Select Unzip files.

3. Launch the ".exe" file in the main folder.

4. Enjoy the game!

Controls:

Spawn RobotController Special Button Right Move left/ Right Left Joystick JumpBottom Face ButtonDashLeft Face Button? Ability ?Right Face Button

Known Bugs:

- If the right player spawns a character first when you start the game. Then when you restart the game, characters will respawn in each other positions.


Credits:

Game Designer/Developer: Lyuboslav Nemtsov

Robot Rig & Animation: Dimitar Kolev
